content: from hook join round 1 chain 2 9sc in 2nd chain from hook join with a slip_stitch to second st from hook first chain st with a slip_stitch to second st from hook first chain st 8 9 round 2 chain 2 double_crochet in same st 2dc in next st round 2 chain 2 double_crochet in same st 2dc in next st and each around including joining st join with and each around including joining st join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 2 18 slip_stitch to top of beg chain 2 20 round 3 chain 2 double_crochet in same st *2dc* in each round 3 chain 2 2dc in next st *double_crochet in next 2dc following st excluding joining st join with slip_stitch in next* around join with slip_stitch to top of beg to top of beg chain 2 36 chain 2 30 round 4 chain 2 2dc in next st *double_crochet in next 2dc round 4 chain 2 double_crochet in next st 2dc in next st *double_crochet in next* around join with slip_stitch to top of beg in next 2 sts 2dc in next* around join with slip_stitch chain 2 54 to top of beg chain 2 40 rounds 5-14 chain 2 double_crochet in first st and each st round 5 chain 2 double_crochet in next 2 sts 2dc in next st around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 2 54 *double_crochet in next 3 sts 2dc in next* around join with fo and weave in ends slip_stitch to top of beg chain 2 50 round 6 chain 2 double_crochet in next 3 sts 2dc in next st *double_crochet in next 4 sts 2dc in next* around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 2 60 rounds 7-14 chain 2 double_crochet in first st and each st around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 2 60 fo and weave in ends adult using 5 5mm i-9 crochet hook follow directions for child/teen size add one extra round after round 14 in the same manner as for round 14 15 rounds in total copyright absolutely no part of this pattern
